org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.cleaner

类 CleanerChore<T extends FileCleanerDelegate>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ScheduledChore
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.cleaner.CleanerChore<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - Cleaner delegate class that is dynamically loaded from configuration
    所有已实现的接口:
    Runnable, ConfigurationObserver
    直接已知子类:
    HFileCleaner, LogCleaner

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public abstract class CleanerChore<T extends FileCleanerDelegate>
extends ScheduledChore
implements ConfigurationObserver
    Abstract Cleaner that uses a chain of delegates to clean a directory of files

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static interface  CleanerChore.Action<T> 
      private class  CleanerChore.CleanerTask
      Attemps to clean up a directory, its subdirectories, and files.
      private static class  CleanerChore.DirScanPool

    • 字段详细资料

      • LOG

        private static final org.slf4j.Logger LOG

      • AVAIL_PROCESSORS

        private static final int AVAIL_PROCESSORS

      • CHORE_POOL_SIZE

        public static final String CHORE_POOL_SIZE
        If it is an integer and >= 1, it would be the size; if 0.0 < size <= 1.0, size would be available processors * size. Pay attention that 1.0 is different from 1, former indicates it will use 100% of cores, while latter will use only 1 thread for chore to scan dir.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • DEFAULT_CHORE_POOL_SIZE

        private static final String DEFAULT_CHORE_POOL_SIZE
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • POOL

        private static volatile CleanerChore.DirScanPool POOL

      • fs

        protected final org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs

      • oldFileDir

        private final org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path oldFileDir

      • conf

        private final org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf

      • params

        protected final Map<String,Object> params

      • enabled

        private final AtomicBoolean enabled

      • cleanersChain

        protected List<T extends FileCleanerDelegate> cleanersChain

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CleanerChore

        public CleanerChore(String name,
                    int sleepPeriod,
                    Stoppable s,
                    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                    org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                    org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path oldFileDir,
                    String confKey)

      • CleanerChore

        public CleanerChore(String name,
                    int sleepPeriod,
                    Stoppable s,
                    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                    org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                    org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path oldFileDir,
                    String confKey,
                    Map<String,Object> params)
        参数:
        name - name of the chore being run
        sleepPeriod - the period of time to sleep between each run
        s - the stopper
        conf - configuration to use
        fs - handle to the FS
        oldFileDir - the path to the archived files
        confKey - configuration key for the classes to instantiate
        params - members could be used in cleaner

    • 方法详细资料

      • initChorePool

        public static void initChorePool(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)

      • shutDownChorePool

        public static void shutDownChorePool()

      • calculatePoolSize

        static int calculatePoolSize(String poolSize)
        Calculate size for cleaner pool.
        参数:
        poolSize - size from configuration
        返回:
        size of pool after calculation

      • validate

        protected abstract boolean validate(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path file)
        Validate the file to see if it even belongs in the directory. If it is valid, then the file will go through the cleaner delegates, but otherwise the file is just deleted.
        参数:
        file - full Path of the file to be checked
        返回:
        true if the file is valid, false otherwise

      • initCleanerChain

        private void initCleanerChain(String confKey)
        Instantiate and initialize all the file cleaners set in the configuration
        参数:
        confKey - key to get the file cleaner classes from the configuration

      • onConfigurationChange

        public void onConfigurationChange(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        从接口复制的说明: ConfigurationObserver
        This method would be called by the ConfigurationManager object when the Configuration object is reloaded from disk.
        指定者:
        onConfigurationChange 在接口中 ConfigurationObserver

      • newFileCleaner

        private T newFileCleaner(String className,
                         org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        A utility method to create new instances of LogCleanerDelegate based on the class name of the LogCleanerDelegate.
        参数:
        className - fully qualified class name of the LogCleanerDelegate
        conf - used configuration
        返回:
        the new instance

      • chore

        protected void chore()
        从类复制的说明: ScheduledChore
        The task to execute on each scheduled execution of the Chore
        指定者:
        chore 在类中 ScheduledChore

      • preRunCleaner

        private void preRunCleaner()

      • runCleaner

        public Boolean runCleaner()

      • sortByConsumedSpace

        private void sortByConsumedSpace(List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus> dirs)
        Sort the given list in (descending) order of the space each element takes
        参数:
        dirs - the list to sort, element in it should be directory (not file)

      • checkAndDeleteFiles

        private boolean checkAndDeleteFiles(List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus> files)
        Run the given files through each of the cleaners to see if it should be deleted, deleting it if necessary.
        参数:
        files - List of FileStatus for the files to check (and possibly delete)
        返回:
        true iff successfully deleted all files

      • deleteFiles

        protected int deleteFiles(Iterable<org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus> filesToDelete)
        Delete the given files
        参数:
        filesToDelete - files to delete
        返回:
        number of deleted files

        从类复制的说明: ScheduledChore
